episodes.synopsis: Romance is in the air after Julien discovers a magic perfume./ Private gets stuck on a shopping trip./ Santa crashes onto the island of Madagascar.
episodes.title: Play All Three: Madagascar Short Stories

episodes.synopsis: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."
episodes.title: Madly Madagascar

episodes.synopsis: Just before Christmas, Private decides to go into the city for some last-minute shopping but along the way winds up stuffed into a Christmas stocking.
episodes.title: Madagascar Penguins in a Christmas Caper

episodes.synopsis: When Santa and his reindeer crash onto the island of Madagascar, it's up to Alex, Marty, Gloria, Melman and those wacky penguins to save Christmas.
episodes.title: Merry Madagascar

video.title: DreamWorks Happy Holidays from Madagascar
video.synopsis: Madagascar goes wild with holiday spirit in this set of Valentine's Day and Christmas-themed tales featuring everyone's favorite animal characters.
